unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kerala, cinephiles are getting ready for a feast of new releases and old classics.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kerala, cinephiles are getting ready for a feast of new releases and old classics.

unnormalised: Speaking of Kerala, the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) is always a highlight, showcasing the best of Indian and international cinema. This year's edition promises a stellar lineup, with rumors of a special screening of a digitally remastered 'Sholay'!
normalised: Speaking of Kerala, the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K) is always a highlight, showcasing the best of Indian and international cinema. This year's edition promises a stellar lineup, with rumors of a special screening of a digitally remastered 'Sholay'!

unnormalised: But it's not just the big names drawing attention. Smaller, independent festivals are popping up all over, providing a platform for emerging filmmakers. Think Goa Short Film Festival and the Kolkata International Children's Film Festival – these are where you discover the next Anurag Kashyap or Aparna Sen.

unnormalised: And while you're catching a flick, don't forget the snacks! No film festival experience is complete without digging into some delicious local fare.
